scripts.protect-build: npm run build && npm run obfuscate
scripts.obfuscate: javascript-obfuscator build/static/js/*.js --output build/static/js/ --compact true --self-defending true --string-array true --string-array-threshold 0.8 --transform-object-keys true --unicode-escape-sequence true
scripts.secure-deploy: npm run protect-build && npm run deploy:protected
